name: Poko's World
description:
Tried combining top-down platforming with side-scrolling platforming

Controls:

  • Z: When in front of wall to attach to wall
  • Also press z when on wall to jump sideways
  • Space: Jump/Detach from wall
  • Wasd/Arrow Keys: Movement

Credits:

Sound FXs from kirby super star ultra

RogueNoodle's Pixel Art shader on itch.io
